ygData.subject: Can anyone share befallen info
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys, From last Friday,me,leshrec,sereph have gotten a beating at befallen however on Sunday,witht he help of Kalandra,a cleric and paladin.We have managed
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys,
From last Friday,me,leshrec,sereph have gotten a beating at befallen however on Sunday,witht he help of Kalandra,a cleric and paladin.We have managed to broke through befallen and got the Barbed Armplates and Antique Silver Ring.However Ive got some questions coz I will be going again for BBC and getting one for Sunblade.

1.How rare is the barbed plates on orge SK?
2.Will women sk have barbed plates?
3.How hard are the toughest creature on level3 and require what level to defeat
4.Besides Troll SK for BBC,I know some other magic items are in befallen however do not where they are,can anyone tell me?eg.Gossmer robe,Thurmatgist robe,Marnek Dagger?Coz I will be on the way getting this for Kalandra,Nicademous or other mages.
5.whats level for Troll SK?
6.How rare is BBC on Troll?
7.Thanks for reading this :)

Kenven
DarkElven Warrior of the 16th Circle
